statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{4 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 3 , -2 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 4 , -5 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x - 5 , -6 \, x^{3} - 15 \, x - 5 , -2 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 3\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
